oai_dc:dc.dc:title: THE RESEARCH OF REGULATION MEASURES ON BRAIDED CHANNEL IN YALU RIVER ESTUARY
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Cao, Yufen
Zheng, Baoyou
Sun, Liancheng
Gao, Feng
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Yalu River estuary
braided channel
regulation measures
research
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: By analyzing nature condition of Yalu River estuary part and many domestic and overseas rivers esturary regulation experience,the regulation principles are put forward and the regulation aim is confirmed according to the requirement of west project of china. By numerical model, the regulation measures on baided channel in Yalu River Estuary have been studied. Two measures are recommended by the research.One which is single dredging way,can be as the 1st stage regulation measure;the other measure which is mixed way of regulation and dredging way,can be as the 2nd stage regulation measure.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 32 (2010): Proceedings of 32nd Conference on Coastal Engineering, Shanghai, China, 2010.; posters.5
